describe: Switzerland is a landlocked country in Central Europe, known for its stunning alpine landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and strong economy. It is famous for its neutrality, banking sector, and high quality of life.

cities.name: 🌆 Zurich
cities.geographical_location: Located in the north-central part of Switzerland, at the northwestern tip of Lake Zurich.
cities.climate: Zurich has a temperate climate with four distinct seasons, featuring cold winters and warm summers.

cities.name: 🌆 Geneva
cities.geographical_location: Situated at the southwestern tip of Switzerland, along the shores of Lake Geneva.
cities.climate: Geneva experiences a temperate climate with mild winters and warm summers.

cities.name: 🏔 Lucerne
cities.geographical_location: Located in central Switzerland, on the shores of Lake Lucerne, surrounded by mountains.
cities.climate: Lucerne has a temperate climate with cool winters and warm summers.

cities.name: 🌆 Interlaken
cities.geographical_location: Nestled between Lake Thun and Lake Brienz in the Bernese Oberland region.
cities.climate: Interlaken has a temperate climate with cold winters and mild to warm summers.
